Text:
Here my comment...
Thanx for the movie, but you should upload full DVD9 or remove extras before encoding it with CCE.

I've just removed extras myself and now the video file is only 3.xGB, so it's a waste of quality of the actual movie.

okyup : I agree with removing the extras but I did one of those and people didn't like it. That is exactly what I do with my personal ones: I put the movie in the DVD player and the movie starts automatically....no extras, but most people like the extras.
Should definately get part two on here.  cheers
siloin869: I did put part 2 up but there were problems with my account and everything got deleted. I uploaded quite a bit more than what shows up.
